content: Hi all who check this out,My name is Eric Steele, I'm posting this everywhere I can think of on this site. Trying to touch base with members of my old unit B and C Co, 1st 37th Armor division that were station in Germany at Katterbach Kaserne, Katterbach just outside Ansbach during 1977-78. My email is **email address deleted posting of personal contact information is not authorized**, please contact me here or at the email address listed. Looking to reunite This message has been edited. Last edited by: OldArmyLove, Sat 30 May 2009 07:11 AM

title: Missing Unit

content: 137 1st armored division moved to Friedberg, Germany then after its deployment in 05-07 it went inactive the whole division did to move to ft Bliss Texas. It will be a while before the unit is back to 100% to deploy and do training exercises. Moving over 200 m1a2 Abrams and around 75 Bradlys plus many support vehicles all across the ocean can cause some issues. The unit is not missing just inactive due to the move to a whole different area of operations. By the way Friedberg/Ray Barracks was handed over to the German Army no i repeat no US troops are stationed there so do not waste your money trying to visit.
reply: 137 1st armored division moved to Friedberg, Germany then after its deployment in 05-07 it went inactive the whole division did to move to ft Bliss Texas.
